title: South Queensferry
name: Hawes Inn
directions: Pretty much under the Rail bridge, at the eastern end of the seafront

reviews.content: The rooms were in tip top shape. The staff was awesome and went above and beyond of my expectations. Highly recommend the hotel with easy access to the French Quarter and wonderful restaurants!
reviews.author: Wilma Becker

description: Historic Inn, where the 19th Century novelist Robert Louis Stevenson is said to have stayed whenever he was journeying to and from the north of the country. The inn is mentioned in his celebrated novel ''Kidnapped''.
